text: Motion
Art Club Vice President
Track Club Member

I'm sorry for the interruption! It's not for an interview,
but... I brought someone interested in joining the club!

Wow... Oh, um...
Thank you so much!
It would mean juggling with the track team...
Huh...

And... um... we have obtained permission from
the teachers and the track team...

I do like drawing illustrations,
but I haven't had formal training... Is that okay?

Y-Yes! Of course!
We have many students like that.
But why now...?

We were talking with Houkura during the interview, When I
learned about the activities of the art club, I became interested!
Motion

...Even the Vice-President started track and field,
so maybe you could give it a try.
Do you think so...?

I understand feeling anxious.
But there's never really a "too late", you know?

I always believe that the best time to start
something is now, in this very moment.

...If you're going to regret something anyway,
I think it's better to regret doing it than not doing it.

And, generally, when you muster up the courage to do
something, you don't regret it even if it doesn't go perfectly.

...Well, that's just a bit of wisdom from someone
who's been around a bit longer.
Juri-san...

We're all rooting for you.
All of us.
Why don't you take that step together?
